00015 package citation.data;
00016 
00017 import java.util.Vector;
00018 import net.rim.device.api.util.Persistable;
00019 
00020 
00027 public class CLocation implements Persistable {
00028         
00029     public static final int NUM_OF_PERSONS = 0;
00030     public static final int NUM_OF_VEHICLES = 1;
00031     public static final int ADDRESS = 2;
00032     public static final int CITY = 3;
00033     public static final int STATE = 4;
00034     public static final int ZIP = 5;
00035     public static final int HIGHWAY = 6;
00036     public static final int COMMONPLACE = 7;
00037     public static final int ELEMENT_COUNT = 8;
00038     
00039     private Vector _elements;
00040     private boolean readonly;
00041 
00042     public CLocation() { 
00043         setReadOnly(false);
00044         _elements = new Vector(ELEMENT_COUNT);
00045         for (int i = 0; i < _elements.capacity(); ++i) {
00046             _elements.addElement(new String(""));
00047         }
00048     }
00049     
00055     public String getElement(int id) {
00056         
00057         // provide parameter guard check
00058         if (id < 0 || id >= ELEMENT_COUNT ) return null;
00059         
00060         return (String) _elements.elementAt(id);
00061     }
00062 
00069     public void setElement(int id, String value) {
00070         
00071         // provide parameter guard check
00072         if (id < 0 || id >= ELEMENT_COUNT ) return;
00073 
00074         if (!isReadOnly() ) {
00075                 _elements.setElementAt(value, id);
00076         }
00077     }
00078     
00084          public void setReadOnly(boolean readonly) {
00085                 this.readonly = readonly;
00086          }
00087 
00088          public boolean isReadOnly() {
00089                 return readonly;
00090          }
00091    
00092         
00096     public String toPrettyString(){
00097         return "Number of People Invloved: "+ getElement(NUM_OF_PERSONS) + "\n" +
00098                 "Number of Vehicles Invloved: "+ getElement(NUM_OF_VEHICLES) + "\n" +
00099                 "Address: "+ getElement(ADDRESS) + "\n" +
00100                 "City: "+ getElement(CITY) + "\n" +
00101                 "State: "+ getElement(STATE) + "\n" +
00102                 "Zip: "+ getElement(ZIP) + "\n" +
00103                 "Highway: "+ getElement(HIGHWAY) + "\n" +
00104                 "Commonplace: "+ getElement(COMMONPLACE) + "\n"; 
00105     }
00106 
00107     
00111     public String toXMLString(){
00112         return
00113                 "<Location>" + "\n" +
00114                         "<NUM_OF_PERSONS>" + getElement(NUM_OF_PERSONS) + "</NUM_OF_PERSONS>" + "\n" + 
00115                         "<NUM_OF_VEHICLES>" + getElement(NUM_OF_VEHICLES) + "</NUM_OF_VEHICLES>" + "\n" +
00116                         "<ADDRESS>" + getElement(ADDRESS) + "</ADDRESS>" + "\n" +
00117                         "<CITY>" + getElement(CITY) + "</CITY>" + "\n" +
00118                         "<STATE>" + getElement(STATE) + "</STATE>" + "\n" +
00119                         "<ZIP>" + getElement(ZIP) + "</ZIP>" + "\n" +
00120                         "<HIGHWAY>" + getElement(HIGHWAY) + "</HIGHWAY>" + "\n" +
00121                         "<COMMONPLACE>" + getElement(COMMONPLACE) + "</COMMONPLACE>" + "\n" +
00122                 "</Location>" + "\n";
00123         }
00124 
00125 }
